website_summaries.verdict: Design of texture on the case ensures you'll always have a strong grip on the phone.
pros: Raised edges around the screen that will protect it from scratches
Includes reinforcement around the entire edge of the case to protect against drops
Textured ridges all around the no-slip grip on the case to produce a steady hold
cons: Grooves on inside of the case may scratch the back of the iPhone X

customer_reviews.title: Received counterfeit product
customer_reviews.text: Received a counterfeit product. Packaging has multiple typos (“IMRACT”) and no genuine Speck sticker
customer_reviews.author: Alex Robertson

customer_reviews.title: This is the 3rd speck case I purchased, however ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd speck case I purchased, however, I have to say it doesn't last well compared with the previous ones. It protects iphone x well, but after just 6 months the case itself was damaged obviously already.
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Turns dirty brown
customer_reviews.text: The case is a pretty turquoise and I have always loved the Speck brand. Screen nevers shatters when dropped. Within a week the rubber it is made of started turning brown. Within 3 weeks it was turquoise with brown stripes. I tried several cleaners and none made a bit of difference. I ran into an Apple representative at the store with the same case and she also had the ugly brown strips. She had tried cleaning hers with no success. I have since bought another case and strongly recommend not buying this case. Unless you like turquoise and dirty brown.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: I drop my phone what feels like every other day and have not ever had a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used Speck cases for every iPhone since the 3Gs. I drop my phone what feels like every other day and have not ever had a screen crack on me. So of course I got one for my iPhone X. The case seems fairly solid, as always. One of the main questions I had, and maybe you have is: Does this case work with wireless charging? Yes it does. Your millage may very but i tried a few wireless chargers and the phone does charge when i put it in all the Qi mats I tried. I'm a fan of the matte finish, but that might not be for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan T. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Long-time speck candyshell user here. I didn't know that I could love Speck more until the Presidio cases! I've been using their cases since probably the iPhone 4. Can't recommend their brand enough. Their customer service is amazing and they stand behind the product. Pros: - High quality & durable cases (p.s. I drop alot) - I've NEVER had a busted iphone with these cases (again I drop alot) - LOVE the matte finish (holds up more over time) Cons: - The grips seem to wear off easily from alot of use but I still love having the grip.
customer_reviews.author: TingedWithTheGinge

customer_reviews.title: Does not protect screen of phone
customer_reviews.text: I used to have lifeproof covers before getting my new IPhone. But since now they are waterproof I went with this cover which was highly rated. However, at day one I realized this was a mistake. This cover will not protect your screen as indicated in the pictures, NOT EVEN CLOSE. Even less than a 4 foot drop will cause the screen to crack. Here is a picture of how my screen cracked with the cover and a screen protector on. If you’re going to trust this cover to protect your $1,000 investment, do not. I am very disappointed by this cover would not recommend to anyone that’s wants adequate protection for their phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Batista

customer_reviews.title: Great case, showed wear too soon.
customer_reviews.text: I really love Speck cases. This one, however, was a bit disappointing. This case was used on and off, let’s say 50/50, over the last 10 months (swapped out with a different speck and an OtterBox). The rubber around the volume and power buttons has already begun to fatigue and appear stretched out. This is a seemingly minor issue, but for a top dollar phone case that touts durability, I’m not super impressed. Of course I bought another candy shell grip to replace it. We shall see how that one lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: however I have really liked this case
customer_reviews.text: I have a different brand case I always use, however that brand was not available yet for the iPhone X so I tried this one. It was supposed to only be on my phone until the other brand became available, however I have really liked this case. It provides a nice grip due to the lines of softer material, yet a solid feel thanks to the harder shell. The grip is perfect for keeping my phone on surfaces and providing security while holding the phone. I always use a case that provides a lip to protect the screen and the camera and this delivers.
customer_reviews.author: F. Pepin

customer_reviews.title: Get a grip!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love, the grips on this Presidio Grip Speck iPhone 10s case. My old phone was always slipping away, but not this one with this case. Don't miss that the edge helps a bit to keep the glass off what you put the phone down on. The only wireless charger I've used, worked fine through the case. I liked the statement that it has been tested by 3rd parties and shown to survive 10' drops, but then I havn't dropped it yet, probably because of the grips! Note that prices vary wildly here, so search several ways. I've had it only a month so can't say 5 stars, yet.
customer_reviews.author: T P in Austin

customer_reviews.title: After 2 months, this case is looking worse for wear
customer_reviews.text: Update: after using the case for a bit over 2 months there are a few quality issues with this case that are disappointing - the edges of the case will scratch the metal of the iPhone, the rubber grip pieces begin to fall out over time, and the rubber bezel around the screen gets worn quickly.. I have changed my rating from 4 to 2 stars. The grip of the rubber edges as well as the added weight of the phone makes one handed use feel very secure. The matte finish feels nice and will hide scratches. I am not sold on the grey color yet but no other colors were available for launch day.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, ergonomic case
customer_reviews.text: Belkin 15W Boost-Up pad can charge through this holster. May be slower than naked phone (not sure) and (based on other reviews) may not work with weaker chargers, but works fine for me with mine. I've tried 3 cases so far and this one is the best ergonomically, and strikes the best balance between function and appearance. Drop protection should be excellent but I have not tested that (yet; thankfully). I have only tried premium cases ($30+ price range).
customer_reviews.author: Sparko

customer_reviews.title: came broken/looked used
customer_reviews.text: I have this speck case in black and I love it so I decided to order another one in grey. The one I got had the rubber already peeling off the sides and the coloring was a mess almost as if it had already been used and rubbed off in a pocket. I wrote who I thought was the seller and they could't find my order. Hope this reaches the right person. $18 isn't a lot, but its frustrating to lose out on still.
customer_reviews.author: lehcar elocin

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend this style !! Month after the grips on the back/side started falling off, okay that’s fine didn’t mind. It also discolored. Then without dropping It the hard plastic parts around the buttons and bottom broke off. At this point by the time I wanted to exchange I was out of the window to. So I ordered another style only to receive an empty package today as if it was never sealed to begin with so who knows when it fell out ! Amazon was able to only refund, I want/need a case !
customer_reviews.author: Megan C

customer_reviews.title: I bought 3 for my family and in all of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 for my family and in all of them the plastic on the back started to fall apart just 2 months later!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grip---good protection
customer_reviews.text: It's attractive with a Good grip, excellent protection without being too bulky. I have already dropped my phone a number of times--on a tile floor, asphalt, carpeted stairs and concrete, with no harm to my "precious". I bought this case because my phone takes abuse. I needed good grip and protection. I also didn't want it to look like a bulky anvil case. This has a slim profile considering all the cushion and extra lip. The color is unique enough that I can spot it easily in my purse or desk. (I bought the lavender). I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Minneapolis Cre8tive

customer_reviews.title: Don’t even bother
customer_reviews.text: Honestly one of the worst cases that I have ever come across. After owning a scale from possibly every single manufacturer this has got to be the most frustrating of the bunch. Removing and taking the case off is a nightmare! I have already scuffed the edges of my brand new phone and now I can never recover from that. Stay away from this phone because once this case is on, it’ll be on for good. Returning it and getting my money back if it’s the last thing that I do.
customer_reviews.author: Marco M.

customer_reviews.title: An Improved Successor to the Candyshell Grip
customer_reviews.text: A great successor to the Speck Candyshell Grip. Compared to the Candyshell, the Presidio Grip has a more matte feel and look, which should prevent some scratches from showing. The logo is also in the right hand corner without being too gaudy or feel like an advertisement. The grip is perfect for holding but won't stick in your pocket. It has enough lip both on the front and back for you to place down on a table without any scratches for the screen or camera bump.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Vu

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Durability
customer_reviews.text: This has sadly been one of the worst cases I’ve bought for my phone. The first month was great, it protected my phone very well and was easy to grip. Unfortunately after a month I started noticing some deterioration. It started with the rubber of the grip starting to peel away. After a couple months the plastic started chipping despite me rarely dropping my phone. 6 months in and every part of this case has some crack. I recommend buying a different case than this if you don’t want to be paying for a new one after a month of use. Unacceptable quality for such a pricey case from Speck.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Galeano

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold and impact resistant
customer_reviews.text: This my second Speck case. I love it. I drop my phone all the time and have never had one break. I currently have an iPhone X and it’s in great shape. I ordered the turquoise color. It will probably get dirty but that’s OK with me. The grips on the side work very well and is one of the reasons I purchased another Speck. I’ll buy another one too. I recommend it to people that have a hard time holding on to those slippery phones or has a habit of dropping their phone. Note: this is not waterproof and has no screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Duus

customer_reviews.title: Great value and smart looking to boot
customer_reviews.text: This is a bit of 2 in 1 review, fit and finish for both 7+ and X, and wear for the 7+. The Speck fit both phones nicely. The case protected my 7+ phone over a year, so when it was time to upgrade I got another. I like the tough, sleek, low profile design. It is very strong and protects well. The only thing I would mention is after a year of use a couple of the rubbery grip lines either wore or were beaten off. It still looked and protected fine. Considering the quality of the protection these are a great value and smart looking to boot.
customer_reviews.author: M. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Not made for iPhone XS
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as made for iPhone XS but box says iPhone X and camera hole is slightly off making the case look funny. Clearly Speck is marketing the iPhone X case for the XS and didn’t move the camera hole to center the camera properly. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste time with pretty colors
customer_reviews.text: The aqua color is beautiful! BUT... with in a day or two the grip part is becoming discolored. (My guess is from being in my jean pocket on occasion at work or from my purse. I went ahead and ordered the black case and will keep the aqua as a backup
customer_reviews.author: mary k

customer_reviews.title: Beware, these cases are counterfeit.
customer_reviews.text: The case looks great , looks really real, but it’s not. I found it amazing how this was shipped and sold by amazon and it’s counterfeit. The box says imract instead of impact. The box has the “authenticity sticker” on it with a code you can check and it failed when I did. I advise everyone to check on realspeck.com to see.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the Lifeproof Frë case before this one. It was okay but I wasn’t the happiest with it because I didn’t feel like I had the iPhone X. The pictures I was taking were blurry, you didn’t see the general outline/sleekness of the phone and stuff kept getting underneath the screen protector. So I ordered this one and I’m SUPER happy I did. I put a piece of tempered glass on the screen and a pop socket on the back of the case! Super super happy with this purchase! It seems durable, it’s light weight, the color and feel of it has acceded my expectations! I can’t say enough good things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great case and affordable feels sturdy and does not slip out of your hands easily since it has the rubber trails on it. With the rubber trails it is hard to put in and pull out of jean pockets if your a girl or a jacket pocket so you may want to consider that before buying this case they are meant to not let your phone slip or fall so easily off surfaces or even from your hand.
customer_reviews.author: kellz

customer_reviews.title: Speck is the only grip phone case for me
customer_reviews.text: I protected my iPhone 6 Plus for years with one Speck Grip Case. This new Presidio Grip is now guarding my iPhone X. The best grip case I have found with a raised lip so phone can be placed face down, and easy to press side buttons. I have ordered many other phone cases over the years and ended up not using them and returned to my trusty Speck.
customer_reviews.author: jbnszk

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Case!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone case and it exceeded my expectations! I was actually half expecting the no-slip grips to start peeling off. But I have been using it a while now and it still looks like new! They grips definitely helped prevented a lot of drops and actually had a nice feel to it. Overall the case is very study, lightweight, and asthetically appealing—received many compliments on my case (black/gray).
customer_reviews.author: Tinahun

customer_reviews.title: Looks Cute & Keeps my Phone Safe
customer_reviews.text: Love this color and case. I always buy this Speck case because of the grips. I drop my husband’s phone all the time because it doesn’t have grips. It protects my phone from all sorts of drops, falls and toddlers. The only downside is that the grips do change color pretty quickly over time because they pick up dirt
customer_reviews.author: Sam K.

customer_reviews.title: Best case I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is without a doubt the best case I have purchased for any iphone I have owned and I have gone through a few before because none had the right grip. Yes, I would go for months with a case that either had too much or too little. I even went without a case on my last iphone because I was tired of using something that was actually more or less useless. Until I saw someone using this case on her iphone. The moment I received my Speck Presidio case I have not taken it off. Excellent, excellent, excellent.
customer_reviews.author: V. Vanderbent

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product design.
customer_reviews.text: As someone who dropped her phone a lot, Speck's Presidio Grip case is exactly what I needed. Once I tried it, I stopped switching cases (for aesthetics) and just kept it moving for 3 years. When I finally committed to upgrading my phone, I ordered this case first, knowing how much I'd need it. White wouldn't normally be my first choice but it I can always spot the phone in any bag I drop it in.
customer_reviews.author: KEW

customer_reviews.title: Rubber grip unraveling within 60 days
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a great product initially but I fear I may have a defective case. Within a month the rubber grip in the back started to come off, and just within two months of receiving the product more rubber is coming off the back. I have difficulty understanding how the adhesive was weak under normal use within the house. I have contacted the seller and will update with their response. Edit: they haven’t responded to my messages. Would not recommend this product or seller to anyone looking for an affordable case. Will be aiming to contact Amazon now.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: A solid choice for an everyday phone case!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as my everyday case. The grip feels pleasant in my hand and the design is pretty nice and attractive. Also, my phone feels protected thanks to the raised bezels, outside layer of poly-carbonate and inside layer of IMPACTIUM rubber, which should protect your phone in your average drop situation (I've dropped mine several times already and I don't even see a scratch on the case.) Overall, a well-designed phone case. I recommend looking for $20 and under prices to feel like you got your money's worth! :)
customer_reviews.author: Poseidon

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for the 2nd time! The first one lasted like 2 years and it protected the phone super well. It was slammed against walls, thrown into streets... the usual wear and tear. Only finally broke during an angry wife incident. She purchased this new one. ...I purchased this new one. It’s my husbands favorite! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna

customer_reviews.title: No-fail side grip, I use this when I have to be sure - but not Qi wireless friendly
customer_reviews.text: When traveling there's lots of opportunities for getting bumped/jostled/surprised, you constantly have your phone in your hand but you're juggling everything else too. So I switch out my day-to-day case with this one, because the rubber ribs wrapping around the sides makes a sure-fire grip. The raised ribs, however are juuuuust tall enough to prevent many Qi wireless chargers from making a solid connection.
customer_reviews.author: Israel Curtis

customer_reviews.title: An ideal case for me.
customer_reviews.text: I previously had an Apple leather case that I really liked, but now that Apple Care is expired, I needed something more durable as I have dropped my phone several times with the leather case. The first day I used this case, I loved it. It is not too bulky, but seems to provide good protection from being dropped. And the "No-Slip Grip" really works well, and feels much more secure in my hands. The only drawback is that it is harder to pull from my pocket while seated because it really does not slip so easily, but I'll gladly take that over a cracked screen. I've only had it for a couple weeks, so cannot comment on its durability.
customer_reviews.author: VICTOR E

customer_reviews.title: Says it fits my phone- IT DOES NOT!
customer_reviews.text: I specifically ordered case for MY phone, the iPhone 6s. This was waaay too big! Very frustrating as I didn’t feel it was even a great deal, I just always like the speck cases. It’s obviously going back. But falsely advertised that it fits my phone - I must point out as that is very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Loveslakes

customer_reviews.title: Solid, phone saver.
customer_reviews.text: I had a grey one and just wanted a different color so I opted for the blue/black combo. These cases are the only way to go. Slim but sophisticated looking, they keep my phone safe. I’ve dropped my phone a few times, because who doesn’t drop a 1000 dollar phone, and the case has protected it. Glad to see there is a product on the market that actually works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: phantombirdie

customer_reviews.title: Great case - protective, slim and grippy
customer_reviews.text: I love this Speck product. I had this same case for my previous phone and I bought it for my new phone. I do like how they have a matte case material instead of just glossy now. It’s protrctive and slim. The gripping bands are perfect for keeping a good grip on your phone especially since I have small hands. I probably buy this for my next phone if they still have them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact with good protection
customer_reviews.text: This is my second presidio grip case. It has always protected the phone when dropped and is compact and will fit in your pocket. Highly recommend for a minimalist case with maximum protection.
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic case with excellent grip
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic case. Buying this as a replacement. My last case had a few good falls resulting in not a scratch on my phone. The last fall finally cracked the bottom of the case, but my phone wasn’t hurt. It was an easy decision to buy the same protective cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Within three weeks of normal usage, several of the rubber bumpers on the case have peeled off.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Langfeld

customer_reviews.title: Discolored after a few weeks of normal use.
customer_reviews.text: The 'surf teal' color does not last long; after a few weeks of use there is gray discoloration on all of the silicon ridges and edges. The case does not retain it's original coloring or appearance. This was with minimal exposure to the elements, dirt or grime. Most of the day the phone/case sits on my desk at work. I don't keep it in a pocket or purse that would potentially rub color off or transpose dye. Irritating, I have returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Bradley

customer_reviews.title: My second one in row
customer_reviews.text: This case has protected my phone for years with many many drops. Never any damage to the phone. Finally had to replace the old case due to regular wear and tear and there was no question that I wanted the same one again. The rubber ribs make it easy to hold and it looks great. Love the protection of the dual-layer rubber and hard plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good grip, already dropped one iPhone X and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Fiits well, good grip, already dropped one iPhone X and it shattered. I am not usually about protective cases, but this is a good one. Recommended to me by a guy at the Apple store, instead of the one they sell!
customer_reviews.author: Vmax

customer_reviews.title: Product Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is my second case from Speck. The case is thin but solid, so I am not concerned about whether it will protect my iphone. The anti-slip grooves work well and i like that safety feature. The color matches what was on screen. I would have given it a 5 star rating but I think that it should have a dust cover for the charging port - but that's just a pet peeve. There are others with dust covers but I like this brand and did not come across many options for that.
customer_reviews.author: Nothing N

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Specks quality has gone downhill for quite some time now and the case is a testament to that. The back rubber pieces begin falling off after 1 week of use. I went to remove my phone from the case and the bottom plastic piece broke off. I recently dropped my phone at the corner where the defective case broke, and guess what it broke my screen. LOW QUALITY. NOT WORTH $5
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Wicke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grip on both the back and sides
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Excellent grip on both the back and sides, stylish yet still slim, seems to provide great drop protection all around, easy on/off, great fit and finish, quality materials, aggressively priced Cons: Wish there were more color options than the 10 or so already available
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Speck cases are the best for protecting your phone!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t even received the new Speck case for my new iPhone 10s but I have had this same case for my iPhones 6 and 7s and I love them! I’m a little clumsy with my phone and drop it often but neither my screen nor the body of my phone has ever sustained damage. The Apple store does not carry Speck cases anymore so I ordered my new one from Amazon before I left the store. This time I ordered a bright color again. My last one was black with gray ribs and I frequently had a hard time finding it in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: newkid

customer_reviews.title: Breaks after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've tried this product. The first product stopped working after about 4 months. This time it only lasted 2 months. The case itself is also poorly designed- The top part that snaps on will consistently fall off and you will lose it unless you DIY find a way to make it work for yourself. It's amazing to have when it works, but unfortunately, it doesn't last.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Peeling
customer_reviews.text: I purchased August 26... too late to return apparently but it’s completely falling apart. All of the pink is lifting/peeling
customer_reviews.author: Megan Karasek

customer_reviews.title: Great and Sexy Case
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Case Love everything. It is very Grippy and Looks very sexy. My one problem is the bottom of the case by the port is there is no grip. Minor problem but worth mentioning. Edit: 9 Months later the rubber has started to peel off. Lasted long enough tho
customer_reviews.author: Chase Pinkerton

customer_reviews.title: Well worth your money
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a Speck fan from the first time I had purchased an iPod Touch and they are still making great products. This case is very durable; I tend to drop my phone a lot and the raised edges have saved my screen every time. The only drawback for me personally, would be that I have a magnetic phone holder in my car and the grips on the phone hinders it from fully adhering to the holder, causing it to slip and fall quite often. I even have a full-strength 2-3 inch magnetic strip inside my case. Otherwise, I love this case and would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: HeatherL

customer_reviews.title: Slim fit, protective case
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case to replace my old one that was super worn. These cases have helped protect my phone from many drops, though also have helped keep me from dropping it as much as I would have if the grips on the side of this case weren’t there (I have butter hands). The grips do wear after a while but as I found with the previous case (same case different color), it took a good year + before I had to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: DRSusieQ

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get what I believe was a Speck case. However, in less than a month, the rubber around the screen started separating from the hard plastic and today, the hard plastic around the sound switch broke off. Not sure if this is symptomatic of the color of the case or the poor quality but it almost immediately started discoloring on the grips on the back. Basically a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan MacLeod

customer_reviews.title: Love the Design, Doesn't Last Forever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone case a while back and just now replacing it. It lasts a long time, but after a while, the rubber on the sound buttons and near the charging cable became worn, which was to be expected. After nearly a year of having it, the rubber came off and I'm buying one from Speck again to replace it. Added bonus, having a case with these colors made it easy to find in my bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amaria

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone cover, fits great, feels nice to hold. This is the second one of these covers on my iPhone X, the first one lasted 3 years. I would highly recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great cell phone case for the money
customer_reviews.text: It works this is the second one I seem to go through one about every year and a half. But I like it because it fits in my shirt pocket in tends to stick a little bit has plenty of friction to keep from falling out.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, regardless of price. The spongy textured features degraded quickly and separated from the hard plastic. See photo. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jason J. Suchman

customer_reviews.title: Great feel and texture
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent iPhone case. It has good feel, and texture. It is slightly larger than some but not as much as a Defender. I looks as if it gives good protection against drops, including on the face. I will still use a glass protector but this is a solid case for the iPhone X which is more fragile.
customer_reviews.author: daysailor

customer_reviews.title: No grip!
customer_reviews.text: This case has no grip. I drop it all the time and it can't be propped up on any hard or smooth surface. I normally like Speck cases, but now I see why this particular one was so inexpensive. Returning immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Irvin

customer_reviews.title: sturdy & protects
customer_reviews.text: my husband loves this brand. it protects his phone. fits well. easy to hold so it doesn't slip from his hand. he is very happy with the product. good price too. cheaper than going thru the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: talkinturtles

customer_reviews.title: On an ocean of love
customer_reviews.text: Other than the fact that accidentally now my phone, purse, and bed sheets are all exactly the same color, this is wonderful! I feel so relaxed anytime I look at my phone. That’s helpful, right?
customer_reviews.author: LiliLadyface

customer_reviews.title: Good Grip but...
customer_reviews.text: I love this case EXCEPT it got dirty/stained so quickly and nothing really cleans it! I tried soap, MR Clean erasers, it still looks filthy., even though nothing comes off on a white wipe. I would buy it again but only in black!
customer_reviews.author: RDR

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid case choice
customer_reviews.text: What I like about the case was (the color and) how easy it was to hold. Not a good case for a magnetic plate, though. The raised grips aren’t conducive to the magnet. It will work, but it’s not as solid a connection as it should be. The grips do look a little dirty after a while, but that wasn’t a big deal to me. They didn’t look disgusting. Just dingy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The idea of this product is great, but the quality of Speck cases has drastically changed since the last case I bought. I have had this case just over 2 months and it has cracked on every single corner and all the rubber gripping is peeling off. I’ve had cheaper cases hold up better than this one, very disappointed that I have to buy a new case already!
customer_reviews.author: Alice Janzen

customer_reviews.title: Fits and protects well
customer_reviews.text: Speck dual layer cases with grip ridges are my go to case for protection and a no-slip grip with a reasonable thickness.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: edges deteriorate and small bits fray off
customer_reviews.text: do not like that small pieces fray off from the sides. feels crummy. 1st one i owned lasted about 1 year before this occurred. 2nd one I bought has begun falling apart in less than 3 months!
customer_reviews.author: Marc Cable

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a while!
customer_reviews.text: Lasted me about a year! Mainly due to kids. They dropped it around a few times so eventually the case cracked on the base and the top. Also the rubber grips were slowly coming off, but this was because I'm a pocket person. I like to slide my phone in my pocket and that loosens the rubber. I contacted Speck to check if items were under warranty and they provided me a new one free of charge! Awesome! So now I'm good for the next year!
customer_reviews.author: Richard W

customer_reviews.title: Her favorite case
customer_reviews.text: Good case, no worries about quality. My wife loves the color and how the darker purple stripes are made out of grippy rubber. Feels good in hand, and won't easily slip out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case
customer_reviews.text: I love Speck cases and have used this same type on different phones. They are easy to hold and have a good grip without being thick. Would recommend to all phone users.
customer_reviews.author: Pknv

customer_reviews.title: Amazinng case
customer_reviews.text: Ive had these phone cases for years. One of the best cases ever. I really do trust these cases. Ive dropped my phone a dozen times with decent height and still no cracks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dominic DiNardi

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this case and wish I’d bought it for the iPhone 7+ that I’d had before. It’s very grippy, and until I tried this case, I didn’t realize how slippery my previous phone felt in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: TuBob Shakur

customer_reviews.title: Durable and cute
customer_reviews.text: These are great cases. If you drop your phone a lot or have kids, you may want to consider another case. But teenagers and adults will love this case! It’s super cute and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: My favorite iPhone X case
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty much my favorite iPhone X case of all time. With mil-spec drop protection, handy rubber anti-slip grips, and low-profile design built all into one case, it's a great all-in-one with virtually no trade-offs.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Love this case
customer_reviews.text: Love this case!!! The rubber grip helps hold and protect the phone. My husband works in construction and this case is perfect for his phone.
customer_reviews.author: Partieof5

customer_reviews.title: Best iPhone Covers
customer_reviews.text: I have used Speck iPhone covers for years. This particular style is my favorite. With this cover on my iPhone, I am less likely to drop the phone or push it off of a desk or counter. Speck covers are far better than other brands. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Perfect grip for no slip!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case if you like yours grippy, not slick. Personally I DON’T want my phone to easily slide out of my pocket, I want to have to ‘fetch’ it! Not huge and bulky but covers where it needs to, protects the corners and frames the glass well. I love the color aqua I got. Couldn’t be happier!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on the phone and gives enough lip ...
customer_reviews.text: Protective case that isn't too bulky, and rubber strips help prevent slipping off of surfaces. Easy to put on the phone and gives enough lip to protect screen from most drops. While not a highly-fashionable look, it does look nice and it holds up well to every day life. Had another one of these and dropped it so many times the corner finally cracked. Phone was fine, but got a new case after pieces of the case started to fall off. This was after a few years and lots of drops!
customer_reviews.author: Gideon Maran

customer_reviews.title: Cracked IPhone X - do not buy
customer_reviews.text: iPhone X has a crack now after falling off coffee table onto hardwood floor. This is the first time in 13 years that I haven’t used an Otterbox. Going back to Otterbox (NEVER cracked a screen in all my years using Otterbox.)
customer_reviews.author: SUPERMAN

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t always deliver
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my 5th speck case, they’ve always been great. I think I even had this exact model once before. Anyway, this one started to fall apart after about a month. The little rubber ridges on the back began to bubble up in spots. So I would simply caution you that the build quality can vary it seems.
customer_reviews.author: B Halliday

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product & Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This case for my iPhone X arrived on time. The grip is fantastic. I use moment lenses with my phone so sometimes have to switch out to the Moment case, and am relieved to switch back to the Speck Grip. They were quick to replace this after 10 months for a very minor issue.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G. Sklar

customer_reviews.title: Cute case
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice case with cute colors. It protected my phone somewhat, however eventually the screen protector did crack. It can support a couple drops from a short distance, but it's not the greatest. The quality is on par with the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Kyana Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for my daily use
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Few months in the rubber back pads are starting to peel prematurely but it’s saved my Phone quiet a few times! Works better than I thought
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: The Best Case I've Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: This case is everything I wanted and more! Easy to hold and lightweight, I was very surprised and excited to notice that this case did not have the extra "bulk" most sturdy and durable cases do. I went from an Otterbox to this case, so it was quite a difference regarding the overall "look and feel", but it was definitely worth the switch. Highly recommend if you're looking for a cheap, durable, and sturdy case without any of the additive bulk most higher-end cases have.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Fits iPhone Xs
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my iPhone Xs, unsure if it would really fit since the specs are slightly different for the X and Xs. The camera fits just fine with a small space around it (dust and stuff can get in there). The bottom is designed for the X, since it has a symmetrical bottom with the speaker/microphone next to the charging port. Compared to the "apple designed" cases, it doesn't cut off the the one side were the mic is, which no one will really notice. Grip is good, haven't had any lines start peeling after a month of use. Would get again!
customer_reviews.author: Caleb McQuerry

customer_reviews.title: After a Few Months the Rubber Strips Rub Off
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this case and the durability, but after holding it and dropping it the rubber strips come apart.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: The aloe green color does not last
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Speck cases and have trusted them with my precious phone in the past. I have also always taken very good care of things that I own. However, this is the first case that has turned colors on me. The aloe green is now brownish gray after only a few weeks. I have tried to wash it in many different ways, but nothing helps. The color has truly worn off. Everything else with the case is perfect: fit, protection, grip, etc. But we all know that many people buy cases not just for the protection, but for the appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Speck presidio grip case
customer_reviews.text: So My girlfriend got the speck presidio grip case for her iPhone X and she loves it so much it came brand new! And it was $9.99! You can’t beat it so I’d recommend buying straight from the seller speck!
customer_reviews.author: Johanna M Rebell

customer_reviews.title: Great case and easy to hold!
customer_reviews.text: I like the durability of this phone case and it gives me some pieces of mind now that the phones are all glass again. It makes me nervous with cheap cases! Great colors to pick from!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unattractive
customer_reviews.text: I loved my last Speck case, so I ordered another one for my new phone. The photo and the description led me to believe that there were two different colors on this case. When it arrived I was surprised to see that the grips were the same color as the case. It wasn't what I expected, but I kept the case because the teal color is nice. Unfortunately, the case didn't look nice for very long. The rubber grips and all the soft areas on the case are now an ugly brownish-gray color and I have not been able to restore them to their original color after repeated cleaning. If you buy this case, I would buy a different color!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hersey

customer_reviews.title: Great Case and texture
customer_reviews.text: These are durable and have just the right amount of stickiness. They will go in and out of pockets with ease but also not slide around on a car dash or other surface.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon fan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect phone case
customer_reviews.text: I love how slim yet protective this phone case is. The color combo is beautiful. In person it’s more pink than the picture shown above. Overall, this was a perfect purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Antongiorgi

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 1 month and 2 days.
customer_reviews.text: My case was delivered July 15th 2020. Today is August 17th 2020 and it’s already falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Porscheguy

customer_reviews.title: Best case ever... Repeat buyer
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th Speck Presidio case I have owned. I've had one on every iPhone over used for 5 years and can easily say they are the best cases. I drop my phone a lot and this case has prevented any damage from occurring. It also doesn't slide around in my truck since it has rubber grip.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Love the case
customer_reviews.text: Love the case!! My phone has fallen many time and once into water with case the phone works and no problems, have used this case ever since I got my first iPhone and that was when they just came out!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful color and I have a great grip on phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the "metallic" case I usually go for was too slippery and I have dropped my phone a couple time. This is a beautiful color and I have a great grip on phone. No more trips to the Apple store to replace my broken screen.
customer_reviews.author: Ardenda

customer_reviews.title: Easy to keep a grip on your phone
customer_reviews.text: I had this style case for my older iPhone. I tried other (slick) cases. This textured one allows me to keep a better grip on my phone. As expensive as the phones are, I can’t risk dropping it. This case is especially good for older people with some arthritis or neuropathy in their hands. This one comes in several colors - I chose turquoise, one of my favorite colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Lopatofsky

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and protection for your Iphone
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for another grip case. They are nice and durable but the rubber lip turns color from dirt and eventually starts to peel away. This is our 3rd case that has done this in 18 months.
customer_reviews.author: nick allo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case for me
customer_reviews.text: Attractive case with awesome grip. 2nd purchase of this product. 1st lasted ~2 yrs. Rubber that offers the great grip feature does wear with time but all cases do. I really like the appearance and how easy it is the hold (and drop) the phone.
customer_reviews.author: S. Allan

customer_reviews.title: Holds up great even when dropped
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to move away from these cases for more unique designs but I just can’t. They hold up so well and withstand multiple drops. Easy to hold with the grips as well.
customer_reviews.author: M Blue

product_meta.title: Speck Products Presidio Grip Case for iPhone XS/iPhone X, Black/Black
product_meta.description: Color:Black/BlackWith an ultra-slim design and superior impact protection, presidio grip is a line of premium grip iPhone cases unlike any other. It’s designed like a fortress, with a protective perimeter to keep shock away from your iPhone. Raised rubber ridges provide a no-slip grip on Speck presidio grip iPhone cases. Presidio grip features the impactium shock barrier, Speck’s innovative new shock-suppression technology that protects your device Without adding unnecessary bulk. Impactium is a Dynamic shock-absorbing material lining the interior of the case that absorbs and disperses shock from impact. Impactium absorbs 52% more shock from impact than traditional TPE rubber. Presidio grip is drop tested from 10 feet Multiple times by a third-party laboratory to test its superior protection from an extreme height, so you can be confident it will hold up to everyday drops. All Speck cases, including presidio grip, are lab tested for scratch resistance, chemical resistance, and precision fit. All presidio cases come with a lifetime limited warranty.
feature_bullets: To ensure that Speck presidio grip offers the ultimate protection for your iPhone, it has been dropped from a height of 10 feet multiple times by third-party laboratories
Impactium is an innovative dynamic shock-absorbing material that lines presidio grip cases
Impactium raised bezel guards screen from direct drops onto phone face and prevents Damage when lying flat
We’ve optimized the design to create the slimmest dual-layer case Speck has ever made, while improving protection
New matte finish resists scratches and offers a modern style with a range of elegant and vibrant colors and presidio grip incorporates raised rubber ridges provide a no-slip grip

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,790 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
